rukus.text: Suraja dhalana tom ba'ada ate rata de hanere taka namaja sathapita karo ate visesa rupa nala amrita vele di kira'ata (kura'ana parhana). Besaka fajara (amrita vele) di kira'ata vica ikagarata hudi hai
Ate rata nu tahajuda (savera tom pahilam di namaza) parho iha nafala (binam faraja namaza) hai tuhade la'i. Umiva hai ki tuhada raba tuhanu ika vadi'a'i vale sathana te kharha kare
Ate akho, ki he mere palanahara! Mainu dakhila karana tam saca kara
Ate akhom, ki saca a gi'a hai. Ate jhutha mita gi'a hai. Besaka jhutha mitana vala hi si
Ate asim kura'ana vicom utarade ham jisa vica imana vali'am la'i sipha ate rahima hai ate zulama karana vali'am la'i isa vicaî€¼ nukasana tom`binham kujha nahim vadhada
Ate manukha ute jadom asim upakara karade ham tam uha bemukha ho ke muha maura lainda hai ate jadom asim kasata dide ham tam uha nirasa ho janda hai
Akho, ki hara ika apani icha anusara kama kara riha hai. Huna tuhada raba hi cagi tar'ham janada hai ki kihara kihara yoga raha ute hai
